meanings.definition: Accepting something as true or real
meanings.sent1: The happy child had a believing heart.
meanings.sent2: She is a believing person who trusts others easily.
meanings.sent3: The cat had a believing look on its face when it saw the laser pointer.
meanings.sent4: His believing smile lit up the room like a beacon of hope.
meanings.sent5: The believing puppy wagged its tail in excitement.

meanings.definition: Having faith or confidence in something
meanings.sent1: The believing student was eager to learn new things.
meanings.sent2: He is a believing friend who always supports me.
meanings.sent3: The believing squirrel thought the acorn was a magical gift.
meanings.sent4: Her believing eyes sparkled with unwavering trust.
meanings.sent5: The believing athlete never gave up on achieving his dreams.
